what: Tools for Spell Checking in R
title: Tools for Spell Checking in R
text: Tools Spell Checking R Spell checking common document formats including latex, markdown, manual pages, description files. Includes utilities automate checking documentation vignettes unit test ‘R CMD check’. British American English supported box languages can added. addition, packages may define ‘wordlist’ allow custom terminology without abuse punctuation.

title: Tools for Spell Checking in R
text: function spell_check_files automatically parses known text formats spell checks text blocks, code chunks. information underlying spelling engine add support languages, see hunspell package. screenshot
code: spell_check_files('README.md', lang = 'en_US') #   WORD       FOUND IN # AppVeyor   README.md:5 # CMD        README.md:12 # RStudio    README.md:8

title: Tools for Spell Checking in R
text: Spell check documentation, description, readme, vignettes package: Review words update wordlist allow : longer marked errors:

title: Tools for Spell Checking in R
text: Use spell_check_setup() add unit test package automatically runs spell check documentation vignettes R CMD check environment variable NOT_CRAN set TRUE. default unit test never fails; merely prints potential spelling errors console. Note NOT_CRAN variable automatically set 1 Travis devtools RStudio, otherwise need set :
code: spell_check_setup("~/workspace/V8") # Adding 'Language: en-US' to DESCRIPTION # No changes required to /Users/jeroen/workspace/V8/inst/WORDLIST # Updated /Users/jeroen/workspace/V8/tests/spelling.R export NOT_CRAN=1 R CMD check V8_1.5.9000.tar.gz # * using log directory ‘/Users/jeroen/workspace/V8.Rcheck’ # * using R version 3.5.1 (2018-07-02) # * using platform: x86_64-apple-darwin15.6.0 (64-bit) # ... # ... # * checking tests ... #   Running ‘spelling.R’ #   Comparing ‘spelling.Rout’ to ‘spelling.Rout.save’ ... title: Package Spell Checking — spell_check_package
text: Automatically spell-check package description, documentation, vignettes.

title: Package Spell Checking — spell_check_package
code: spell_check_package(pkg = ".", vignettes = TRUE, use_wordlist = TRUE)  spell_check_setup(pkg = ".", vignettes = TRUE, lang = "en-US", error = FALSE)

title: Package Spell Checking — spell_check_package
text: pkg path package root directory containing DESCRIPTION file vignettes check rmd rnw files pkg root directory (e.g. readme.md) package vignettes folder. use_wordlist ignore words package WORDLIST file lang set Language field DESCRIPTION e.g. "en-US" "en-GB". supporting languages, see hunspell vignette. error CMD check fail spelling errors found? Default prints results.

title: Package Spell Checking — spell_check_package
text: Parses checks R manual pages, rmd/rnw vignettes, text fields package DESCRIPTION file. preferred spelling language (typically en-GB en-US) specified Language field package DESCRIPTION. allow custom words, use package WORDLIST file added dictionary spell checking. See update_wordlist automatically populate update file. spell_check_setup function adds unit test package automatically runs spell check documentation vignettes R CMD check environment variable NOT_CRAN set TRUE. default unit test never fails; merely prints potential spelling errors console. already done, spell_check_setup function add spelling Suggests dependency, Language field DESCRIPTION. Hunspell includes dictionaries en_US en_GB default. languages require installation custom dictionary, see hunspell details.

title: The WORDLIST file — wordlist
text: package wordlist file used allow custom words added dictionary spell checking. stored inst/WORDLIST source package must contain one word per line UTF-8 encoded text.

title: The WORDLIST file — wordlist
code: update_wordlist(pkg = ".", vignettes = TRUE, confirm = TRUE)  get_wordlist(pkg = ".")

title: The WORDLIST file — wordlist
text: pkg path package root directory containing DESCRIPTION file vignettes check rmd rnw files pkg root directory (e.g. readme.md) package vignettes folder. confirm show changes ask confirmation adding new words list

title: The WORDLIST file — wordlist
text: update_wordlist function runs full spell check package, shows results, prompts add found words package wordlist. Obviously check closely legitimate words actual spelling errors. also removes words wordlist longer appear spelling errors, either removed documentation added lang dictionary.
